participant_1.background:
I went on a trip to Japan to research my next book.
i live close to the coast.
I met the love of my life while working at the hospital.
My internal arguments are often more interesting than my conversations with others.
my favorite food is hamburgers.

participant_2.background:
I used my artistic skills to teach children how to create beautiful and creative works of art.
I don't have a specific exercise routine, but I try to get some activity in most days of the week.
i m also a fulltime student studying radiology at local college.
i ve never been to the beach.
I play in a band that my parents don't know about.

content.text: Hello, how are you?
Hey, doing well! You?
I'm doing well, thank you. I just got back from Japan, where I was doing research for my next book.
That sounds amazing! I've never been to Japan.
It was beautiful! I had such a great time. I met the love of my life while I was there, too.
That's wonderful! I'm happy for you.
Thank you. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to paint, and I play in a band with some friends.
That's really cool! I love to paint too, but I'm not very good at it.
Hey, everyone is good at something. I'm sure you're great at painting.
Thank you. I appreciate that. What kind of music does your band play?
We play all sorts of music, but we mostly play rock and roll.
That sounds fun. I love to listen to rock and roll.
We're playing at a local bar next weekend, if you'd like to come.
I would love to! What's the name of your band?
It's called The Electric Blues.
I'll be sure to come check it out.
Great! I hope to see you there.
Me too. Bye!
Bye!
